Description: Returns a sha1 hash value as a hex string of expr.

Description: Returns a sha1 hash value as a hex string of expr.

Name: sha2
Description: Returns a checksum of the SHA-2 family as a hex string of expr.

Name: shiftleft
Description: Returns a bitwise left shifted by n bits.

Name: shiftright
Description: Returns a bitwise signed signed integral number right shifted by n bits.

Name: shiftrightunsigned
Description: Returns a bitwise unsigned signed integral number right shifted by n bits.

Name: shuffle
Description: Returns a random permutation of the array in expr.

Name: sign
Description: Returns -1.0, 0.0, or 1.0 as expr is negative, 0, or positive.

Name: signum
Description: Returns -1.0, 0.0, or 1.0 as expr is negative, 0, or positive.

Name: sin
Description: Returns the sine of expr.

Name: sinh
Description: Returns the hyperbolic sine of expr.

Name: size
Description: Returns the cardinality of expr.

Name: skewness
Description: Returns the skewness value calculated from values of a group.

Name: slice
Description: Returns a subset of an array.

Name: smallint
Description: Casts the value expr to SMALLINT.

Name: some
Description: Returns true if at least one value of expr in a group is true.

Name: sort_array
Description: Returns the array in expr in sorted order.

Name: soundex
Description: Returns the soundex code of the string.

Name: space
Description: Returns a string consisting of n spaces.

Name: spark_partition_id
Description: Returns the current partition ID.

Name: split
Description: Splits str around occurrences that match regex and returns an array with a length of at most limit.

Name: split_part
Description: Splits str around occurrences of delim and returns the partNum part.

Name: sql_keywords
Description: Returns the set of SQL keywords in Databricks.

Name: sqrt
Description: Returns the square root of expr.

Name: stack
Description: Separates expr1, …, exprN into numRows rows.

Name: startswith
Description: Returns true if expr STRING or BINARY starts with startExpr.

Name: std
Description: Returns the sample standard deviation calculated from the values within the group.

Name: stddev
Description: Returns the sample standard deviation calculated from the values within the group.

Name: stddev_pop
Description: Returns the population standard deviation calculated from values of a group.

Name: stddev_samp
Description: Returns the sample standard deviation calculated from values of a group.

Name: str ilike
Description: Returns true if str matches pattern with escape case insensitively.

Name: str like
Description: Returns true if str matches pattern with escape.

Name: str_to_map
Description: Returns a map after splitting expr into key-value pairs using delimiters.

Name: string
Description: Casts the value expr to STRING.

Name: string_agg
Description: Returns a concatenated STRING or BINARY of all values in expr within the group, separated by delim.

Name: struct
Description: Creates a STRUCT with the specified field values.

Name: substr
Description: Returns the substring of expr that starts at pos and is of length len.

Name: substring
Description: Returns the substring of expr that starts at pos and is of length len.

Name: substring_index
Description: Returns the substring of expr before count occurrences of the delimiter delim.

Name: sum
Description: Returns the sum calculated from values of a group.

Name: table_changes
Description: Returns a log of changes to a Delta Lake table with Change Data Feed enabled.

Name: tan
Description: Returns the tangent of expr.

Name: tanh
Description: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of expr.

Name: timediff
Description: Returns the difference between two timestamps measured in units.

Name: timestamp
Description: Casts expr to TIMESTAMP.

Name: timestamp_micros
Description: Creates a timestamp expr microseconds since UTC epoch.

Name: timestamp_millis
Description: Creates a timestamp expr milliseconds since UTC epoch.

Name: timestamp_seconds
Description: Creates timestamp expr seconds since UTC epoch.

Name: timestampadd
Description: Adds value units to a timestamp expr.

Name: timestampdiff
Description: Returns the difference between two timestamps measured in units.

Name: tinyint
Description: Casts expr to TINYINT.

Name: to_avro
Description: Returns an Avro binary value with the specified struct value.

Name: to_binary
Description: Returns expr cast to a Binary based on fmt.

Name: to_char
Description: Returns numExpr cast to STRING using formatting fmt.”

Name: to_csv
Description: Returns a CSV string with the specified struct value.

Name: to_date
Description: Returns expr cast to a date using an optional formatting.

Name: to_json
Description: Returns a JSON string with the STRUCT or VARIANT specified in expr.

Name: to_number
Description: Returns expr cast to DECIMAL using formatting fmt.

Name: to_timestamp
Description: Returns expr cast to a timestamp using an optional formatting.

Name: to_unix_timestamp
Description: Returns the timestamp in expr as a UNIX timestamp.

Name: to_utc_timestamp
Description: Returns the timestamp at UTC for a timestamp expr at timezone.

Name: to_varchar
Description: Returns numExpr cast to STRING using formatting fmt.”

Name: transform
Description: Transforms elements in an array in expr using the function func.

Name: transform_keys
Description: Transforms keys in a map in expr using the function func.

Name: transform_values
Description: Transforms values in a map in expr using the function func.

Name: translate
Description: Returns an expr where all characters in from have been replaced with those in to.

Name: trim
Description: Trim characters from a string.

Name: trunc
Description: Returns a date with the a portion of the date truncated to the unit specified by the format model fmt.

Name: try_add
Description: Returns the sum of expr1 and expr2, or NULL in case of error.

Name: try_aes_decrypt
Description: Decrypts a binary expr using AES encryption, and return NULL in case of error.

Name: try_avg
Description: Returns the mean calculated from values of a group, NULL if there is an overflow.

Name: try_cast
Description: Casts the value expr to the target data type type safely.

Name: try_divide
Description: Returns dividend divided by divisor, or NULL if divisor is 0.

Name: try_element_at
Description: Returns the element of an arrayExpr at index, or NULL if index is out of bound.

Name: try_mod
Description: Returns the remainder after dividend / divisor, or NULL if divisor is 0..

Name: try_multiply
Description: Returns multiplier multiplied by multiplicand, or NULL on overflow.

Name: try_parse_json
Description: Returns a VARIANT value from the jsonStr if possible. If not possible, NULL is returned.

Name: try_reflect
Description: Calls a method with reflection, returning NULL if the method fails.

Name: try_secret
Description: Extracts a secret value with the given scope and key from Databricks secret service, or NULL if the key cannot be retrieved.

Name: try_subtract
Description: Returns the subtraction of expr2 from expr1, or NULL on overflow.

Name: try_sum
Description: Returns the sum calculated from values of a group, NULL if there is an overflow.

Name: try_to_binary
Description: Returns expr cast to BINARY based on fmt, or NULL if the input is invalid.

Name: try_to_number
Description: Returns expr cast to DECIMAL using formatting fmt, or NULL if expr does not match the format.

Name: try_to_timestamp
Description: Returns expr cast to a timestamp using an optional formatting, or NULL if the cast fails.

Name: try_url_decode
Description: Translates a string back from application/x-www-form-urlencoded format, and returns NULL in case of error.

Name: try_variant_get
Description: Extracts a value of type type from variantExpr, specified by path, or NULL if it is not possible to cast to the target type.

Name: try_zstd_decompress
Description: Returns value decompressed with Zstandard compression, or NULL if the input is invalid.

Name: typeof
Description: Return a DDL-formatted type string for the data type of expr.

Name: ucase
Description: Returns expr with all characters changed to uppercase.

Name: unbase64
Description: Returns a decoded base64 string as binary.

Name: unhex
Description: Converts hexadecimal expr to BINARY.

Name: uniform
Description: Returns a random value with independent and identically distributed values within the specified range of numbers.

Name: unix_date
Description: Returns the number of days since 1970-01-01.

Name: unix_micros
Description: Returns the number of microseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC.

Name: unix_millis
Description: Returns the number of milliseconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC.

Name: unix_seconds
Description: Returns the number of seconds since 1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC.

Name: unix_timestamp
Description: eturns the UNIX timestamp of current or specified time.

Name: upper
Description: Returns expr with all characters changed to uppercase.

Name: url_decode
Description: Translates a string back from application/x-www-form-urlencoded format.

Name: url_encode
Description: Translates a string into application/x-www-form-urlencoded format.

Name: user
Description: Returns the user executing the statement.

Name: uuid
Description: Returns an universally unique identifier (UUID) string.

Name: var_pop
Description: Returns the population variance calculated from values of a group.

Name: var_samp
Description: Returns the sample variance calculated from values of a group.

Name: variance
Description: Returns the sample variance calculated from values of a group.

Name: variant_explode
Description: Returns a set of rows by un-nesting input.

Name: variant_explode_outer
Description: Returns a set of rows by un-nesting input using outer semantics.

Name: variant_get
Description: Extracts a value of type type from variantExpr, specified by path.

Name: vector_search
Description: Query a Mosaic AI Vector Search index using SQL.

Name: version
Description: Returns the Apache Spark version.

Name: weekday
Description: Returns the day of the week of expr.

Name: weekofyear
Description: Returns the week of the year of expr.

Name: width_bucket
Description: Returns the bucket number for a value in an equi-width histogram.

Name: window
Description: Creates a hopping based sliding-window over a timestamp expression.

Name: window_time
Description: Returns the inclusive end time of a sliding-window produced by the window or session_window functions.

Name: xpath
Description: Returns values within the nodes of xml that match xpath.

Name: xpath_boolean
Description: Returns true if the xpath expression evaluates to true, or if a matching node in xml is found.

Name: xpath_double
Description: Returns a DOUBLE value from an XML document.

Name: xpath_float
Description: Returns a FLOAT value from an XML document.

Name: xpath_int
Description: Returns a INTEGER value from an XML document.

Name: xpath_long
Description: Returns a BIGINT value from an XML document.

Name: xpath_number
Description: Returns a DOUBLE value from an XML document.

Name: xpath_short
Description: Returns a SHORT value from an XML document.

Name: xpath_string
Description: Returns the contents of the first XML node that matches the XPath expression.

Name: xxhash64
Description: Returns a 64-bit hashed value of the arguments.

Name: year
Description: Returns the year component of expr.

Name: zip_with
Description: Merges the arrays in expr1 and expr2, element-wise, into a single array using func.

Name: zstd_compress
Description: Returns value compressed with Zstandard compression.

Name: zstd_decompress
Description: Returns value decompressed with Zstandard compression.
